description: Improved water quality of the river Golema reka through river bed restoration measures and establishment of a pesticide packaging waste management system.

subproject.description:
The main goal of the project is formulation of a restoration plan for Golema Reka through: 
a) assessment of the present situation 
b) preparation of a main design for restoration of the river and 
c) physical measures for restoration of the section of the riverbed  of Golema Reka in the urban area. 
The project activities will be complementary to the UNDP-GEF Prespa Park project. 
Outputs: 
1. Technical documentation required for undertaking river restoration and protection actions completed. 
2. Improvement of the river’s environmental status through implementation of prioritized set of restoration/protection measures and activities.
subproject.title: Golema Reka Programme

title: Golema Reka Programme
